title: Stomach sounds
text: I’ve noticed my stomach has become more sensitive lately. It has been making sounds and now it’s while I’m eating too. I have been taking small bites and sips and it’s still happening. I just want to know if anyone has experienced this? I’ve reached out to my care team but they said there is no cause for concern. I do have occasional pain along with it. I’ve never had this before and I’m 1 year post op.
